<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Used to differentiate between target-specific &quot;direct&quot; flags and &quot;bitmask&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// flags. A machine operand can only have one &quot;direct&quot; flag, but can have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// multiple &quot;bitmask&quot; flags.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a03a83eb6d12005ac7d43d370f4eb5078a603e42cc9130112fdcc131ac29a8e56f"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a03a83eb6d12005ac7d43d370f4eb5078a603e42cc9130112fdcc131ac29a8e56f">MO&#95;DIRECT&#95;FLAG&#95;MASK</a> = 0x3f,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a03a83eb6d12005ac7d43d370f4eb5078a54a53e14720548a9a542da056797792d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a03a83eb6d12005ac7d43d370f4eb5078a54a53e14720548a9a542da056797792d">MO&#95;RELAX</a> = 64</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Given a MachineOperand that may carry out &quot;bitmask&quot; flags, such as MO&#95;RELAX,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// return LoongArch target-specific &quot;direct&quot; flags.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#ab4d10aeb6baa9b7d22a3e7a108243e7a"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#ab4d10aeb6baa9b7d22a3e7a108243e7a">getDirectFlags</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ab06dda088d3c7686f7dfcdb2b96323f5">getTargetFlags</a>() &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a03a83eb6d12005ac7d43d370f4eb5078a603e42cc9130112fdcc131ac29a8e56f">MO&#95;DIRECT&#95;FLAG&#95;MASK</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add MO&#95;RELAX &quot;bitmask&quot; flag when FeatureRelax is enabled.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#aec7148c4c79a82435bb10820b7b77a63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#aec7148c4c79a82435bb10820b7b77a63">encodeFlags</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Flags, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Relax) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// \\returns true if the given MachineOperand has MO&#95;RELAX &quot;bitmask&quot; flag.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a2f9fa0e4abfc14d359493021fdef57ca"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a2f9fa0e4abfc14d359493021fdef57ca">hasRelaxFlag</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ab06dda088d3c7686f7dfcdb2b96323f5">getTargetFlags</a>() &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a03a83eb6d12005ac7d43d370f4eb5078a54a53e14720548a9a542da056797792d">MO&#95;RELAX</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Target-specific flags of LAInst.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// All definitions must match LoongArchInstrFormats.td.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Whether the instruction&#39;s rd is normally required to differ from rj and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// rk, in the way the 3-register atomic memory operations behave</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (Section 2.2.7.1 and 2.2.7.2, LoongArch Reference Manual Volume 1 v1.10;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// while Section 2.2.7.3 lacked similar description for the AMCAS</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions, at least the INE exception is still signaled on Loongson</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3A6000 when its rd == rj).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Used for generating diagnostics for assembler input that violate the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// constraint. As described on the manual, the covered instructions require</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// rd != rj &amp;&amp; rd != rk to work as intended.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a1b3c5f4543d57e05692d5af0fbe96738a286ed93291ef31d4d11c04e96126b23d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a1b3c5f4543d57e05692d5af0fbe96738a286ed93291ef31d4d11c04e96126b23d">IsSubjectToAMORdConstraintShift</a> = 0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a1b3c5f4543d57e05692d5af0fbe96738ab792d4fa2c40e2ed4c2119ca402b74fc"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a1b3c5f4543d57e05692d5af0fbe96738ab792d4fa2c40e2ed4c2119ca402b74fc">IsSubjectToAMORdConstraintMask</a> = 1 &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a1b3c5f4543d57e05692d5af0fbe96738a286ed93291ef31d4d11c04e96126b23d">IsSubjectToAMORdConstraintShift</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Whether the instruction belongs to the AMCAS family.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a1b3c5f4543d57e05692d5af0fbe96738af1cb94b353279a3a957b0a63e7dcbf3b"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a1b3c5f4543d57e05692d5af0fbe96738af1cb94b353279a3a957b0a63e7dcbf3b">IsAMCASShift</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a1b3c5f4543d57e05692d5af0fbe96738a286ed93291ef31d4d11c04e96126b23d">IsSubjectToAMORdConstraintShift</a> + 1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a1b3c5f4543d57e05692d5af0fbe96738a46be2cc5190008faeac52cd5dd937b43"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a1b3c5f4543d57e05692d5af0fbe96738a46be2cc5190008faeac52cd5dd937b43">IsAMCASMask</a> = 1 &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a1b3c5f4543d57e05692d5af0fbe96738af1cb94b353279a3a957b0a63e7dcbf3b">IsAMCASShift</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\returns true if this instruction&#39;s rd is normally required to differ</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">/// from rj and rk, in the way 3-register atomic memory operations behave.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a4875afc76f72cb9aea2d71bca9062f30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchii/#a4875afc76f72cb9aea2d71bca9062f30">isSubjectToAMORdConstraint</a>(uint64&#95;t TSFlags) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
